com.communote.server.web.commons.resolver

Class CommunoteMultipartResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsFileUploadSupport
      • org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartResolver
        • com.communote.server.web.commons.resolver.CommunoteMultipartResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartResolver

    public class CommunoteMultipartResolver
extends org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartResolver
    A multipart resolver that calculates the maxUploadSize from the configured attachment upload limit and an additional configurable offset.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      void setMaxSizeOffset(long maxSizeOffset)
